title: Zest Wishes
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, Organic, Juice bar, Take-out, Catering, Fusion, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Health food and beverage stand at Pittsburgh Public Market. The chef/owner creates weekly-changing items from scratch. Vegan items might include a almond-black bean-veggie burger, vegan grilled cheese, citrus millet-veggie salad, slow smoked organic tofu with BBQ sauce. Beverages include cold-pressed organic juice blends, house-made coconut milk and unsweetened almond milk. Sells take home foodstuff like pickled organic vegetables in raw apple cider brine, heat-n-eat nut-grain salisbury steak, organic vegetable broth, and organic raw apple cider vinaigrette. Uses biodegradable and/or compostable take out containers. Previously located on Smallman St.
